info.description: Aggregate API for communicating with the server Tyrion. Please carefully check each version. Some APIs require special permissions. Some are designed for only certain types of mobile devices. For more information write to Tyrion Team tyrion@byzance.cz
info.title: Tyrion Api

contact.name:
Tyrion Team leader:: alexandr.tyls@byzance.cz, 

 tyrion@byzance.cz, support@byzance.cz

tags.name: Not Documented API - InProgress or Stuck

put.description: Compile specific version of C_program - before compilation - you have to update (save) version code

x-permission_description.C_program.Version.read_permission: read: If user have "Object".read_permission = true, you can read / get version on this Object - Or you need static/dynamic permission key

post.description: Compile code

put.summary: update Embedded Hardware with C_program compilation
put.description: Upload compilation to list of hardware. Compilation is on Version oc C_program. And before uplouding compilation, you must succesfuly compile required version before! Result (HTML code) will be every time 200. - Its because upload, restart, etc.. operation need more than ++30 second There is also problem / chance that Tyrion didn't find where Embedded hardware is. So you have to listening Server Sent Events (SSE) and show "future" message to the user!

x-permission_description.Board_Disconnection: read: If user want remove Board from Project, he needs one single permission Project.update_permission, where hardware is registered. - Or user need static/dynamic permission key

get.description:
Check Board state for new Registration. Types of responses in JSON state value[CAN_REGISTER, NOT_EXIST, ALREADY_REGISTERED_IN_YOUR_ACCOUNT, ALREADY_REGISTERED, PERMANENTLY_DISABLED, BROKEN_DEVICE]... 
 PERMANENTLY_DISABLED - device was removed by Byzance. 
BROKEN_DEVICE - device exist - but its not possible to registered that. Damaged during manufacturing.

put.description: This Api is used by Users for connection of Board with their Project

404.description: Objects not found - details in message

x-permission_description.Board_Connection: read: If user want connect Project with board, he needs two Permission! Project.update_permission == true and also Board.first_connect_permission == true.  - Or user need combination of static/dynamic permission key and Board.first_connect_permission == true

get.description: get all Tariffs - required for every else action in system. For example: Project is created under the Product which is under some Tariff

post.description:
It is the base object. Peak of Pyramid :). This Api is used for its creation. You can get two kind of response: 

First(201):  System create new Object - Product 

Second(200): The product requires payment - The server creates the object, but returns an Invoice 

If the user choose credit card payment, the invoice will contain gw_url, which is a link to the payment gate, you can redirect him there. If bank transfer is chosen, server will return an Invoice, but the user will pay it independently via his bank account.

get.summary: get all Products with all information's

deactivate product and deactivate all stuff under it
activate product and deactivate all staff around that
creates invoice - credit will be added after payment if payment method is bank transfer or if getting money from credit card is successful

For connection to websocket, you have to connect with temporary unique token. This Api return Tokenwith a maximum lifetime of 5 seconds. After the token is deactivated. After logging in, or the connectionlost is token deactivated also.

post.description: Request password or email change. API does not change password or email, only sends email for authorization of the change and holds values in different object.JSON value 'property' contains only 'password' or 'email'

put.description: Uploads personal photo. Picture must be smaller than 800 KB and its dimensions must be between 50 and 400 pixels. If user already has a picture, it will be replaced by the new one. API requires base64 Content-Type, name of the property is 'file'.

Only for Grid Terminals! Before when you want connect terminal (grid) application with Tyrion throw WebSocker. You need unique identification key. If Person loggs to you application Tyrion connects this device with Person. Try to save this key to cookies or on mobile device, or you have to ask every time again

Get list of latest user notifications. Server return maximum 25 latest objects. 

 For get another page (next 25 notifications) call this api with "page_number" path parameter. 

 May missing or you can insert Integer values from page[1,2...,n] in JsonNotification body cannot by documented through swagger. Visit wiki.byzance.cz

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: page_number is Integer. Contain  1,2...  For first call, use 1

get.description: This API should by called right after user logs in. Sends notifications which require confirmation via websocket.

post.description: for logout person - that's deactivate person token

For login via Facebook 

 If you want login to system with social networks - you can used Facebook, GitHub, Twitter... api just ask via this Api and cloud_blocko_server responds with object where is token and redirection link. After that redirect user to this link and after returning to your success page you have to ask again (api - get Person by token ) for information about logged Person

For login via GitHub 

 If you want login to system with social networks - you can used Facebook, GitHub, Twitter... api just ask via this Api and cloud_blocko_server responds with object where is token and redirection link. After that redirect user to this link and after returning to your success page you have to ask again (api - get Person by token ) for information about logged Person
Get access Token

post.summary: check Request Token for blocko REST-API blocks

get.summary: get Person by token (after Oauth2 Login -> Facebook, GitHub, Twitter)
get.description: If you want login to system with social networks - you can used facebook, github or twitter api just ask for token, server responds with object where is token and redirection link. Redirect user to this link and after returning to success page that you filled in ask for token, ask again to this api and server respond with Person Object and with Roles and Permissions lists

message.description: Can be null! If not, you can show that to User

Server Offline.description: External servers (compilation, blocko cloud_blocko_server etc.) are offline

type_of_board_id.description: Required only if user compile code not under C++ code version (where compilation can found type_of_board)

imported_libraries.description: List ID of libraries version ID

C_Program_Version_Update.description: Json Model for new Version of C_Program

message.description: Can be null! If not, you can show that to User. Server fills the message only when it is important.

board_pairs.description: List of Pairs for settings of Backup C_Program Version on boards

List of Boards.description: Json Model with List of Board ID

Invalid Body.description: Provided body is not valid. Something is missing or some field input is not allowed.

description.description: Length must be between 24 and 255 characters.

processor_code.description: The Processor Code must have at least 4 characters

processor_name.description: Length must be between 4 and 60 characters.

name.description: Length must be between 8 and 60 characters.

compiler_target_name.description: The description must have at least 4 characters

description.description: The description must have at least 4 characters

connectible_to_internet.description: If device can connect to internet

device_ids.description: Must be unique!!!, The hardware_id must have 20 hexadecimal characters!, It can combination of master devices and others

Board_for_fast_upload_detail.description: Json Model for board with details for fast upload

instance_id.description: Only if Boar is under person Instance (in Blocko)

instance_online_status.description: Only if Boar is under person Instance (in Blocko)

Board_Status.description: Json Model for Status and all information about embedded Hardware

c_program_id.description: only if Firmware_type is firmware or backup

c_program_version_id.description: only if Firmware_type is firmware or backup

c_program_program_name.description: only if Firmware_type is firmware or backup

c_program_version_name.description: only if Firmware_type is firmware or backup

C_Program_Update_plan_Short_Detail.description: Json Model with details of C_program>

personal_description.description: Length must be between 0 and 255 characters.

Board_Personal_Description.description: Json Model for update personal description of Board

board_backup_pair_list.description: List of Pairs for settings of Backup on boards

backup_mode.description: True - for auto_backup. False for static backup. If static c_program_version_id is required!

c_program_version_id.description: Required if backup_mode is false. C_program_version_id must be compiled and for same type of Board!

from.description: First value position from all subjects. Minimum is 0.

pages.description: Numbers of pages, which you can call

Board_Registration_Status.description: Json Model for Status and all information about embedded Hardware

Board_Short_Detail.description: Json Model Board - only basic information

Boards_For_Blocko.description: Json Model for Blocko in Becki for accessible hardware and firmware versions

virtual_input_output.description: It can be null if server has not image of compilation restored in database

C_Program_Version_Short_Detail.description: Json Model for Public Version of C_program

Internal Server Error.description: When server is in fault state

project_id.description: Length must be between 8 and 60 characters.

name.description: Length must be between 4 and 60 characters.

description.description: program_description can be null or maximum length of 255 characters.

from.description: First value position from all subjects. Minimum is 0.

pages.description: Numbers of pages, which you can call

company_name.description: Only if Product is for business

name.description: Required: always. The name length must be between 4 and 60 characters

payment_method.description: Required: only in if payment_method_required is true  values =>[bank_transfer, credit_card]

street.description: Required: alwaysThe street must have at least 4 characters

street_number.description: Required: alwaysBut The street_number can be empty

city.description: Required: alwaysThe city must have at least 2 characters

zip_code.description: Required: alwaysThe zip_code must have at least 5 digits

country.description: Required: alwaysThe country must have at least 4 characters

registration_no.description: Required: only if account is businessThe company_registration_no must have at least 4 characters - FOR non-EU countriesfor Business account is required registration_no OR vat_number

vat_number.description: Required: only if account is business & from EU!!! CZ28496639 The VAT_number must have at least 4 charactersfor Business account is required registration_no OR vat_number

company_name.description: Required: only if account is businessThe company_name must have at least 4 characters

company_authorized_email.description: Required: only if account is businessThe company_authorized_email must have at least 4 characters

company_authorized_phone.description: Required: only if account is businessThe company_authorized_phone must have at least 4 characters

company_web.description: Required: only if account is businessThe company_web must have at least 4 characters

invoice_email.description: Required: always, Email must be valid

name.description: Required: always. The name length must be between 4 and 60 characters

credit.description: Double number - amount of credit to be bought.

street.description: Required: alwaysThe street must have at least 4 characters

street_number.description: Required: alwaysBut The street_number can be empty

city.description: Required: alwaysThe city must have at least 4 characters

zip_code.description: Required: alwaysThe zip_code must have at least 5 digits

country.description: Required: alwaysThe country must have at least 4 characters

company_account.description: Required: only if user want have business account

vat_number.description: Required: only if company_account = true And VAT_number is required only for EU Customers.The VAT_number must have at least 4 characters
